title: people complaining about ranked
body:
they always complain and say that their division is the worst, even if there are like 15 divisions behind them which are most likely even more terrible everyone complains like they are in the worst place in the worst time and i'm beginning to think it's an attitude problem.
might not be though, it could (in a twisted way) get worse as you climb

replies.body:
ranked does suck. all the people playing r idiots and just complain about everything. i went in a q yesterday and the first thing was. omg 1st pick stole my position gg im feeding.
ranked sucks

yeah I agree.
I don't play it because people are angry on an un-healthy scale.
if everyone played ranked like Riot staff played the game it may not require as much skill as some people,
but it would certainly be enjoyable.
I participated in play with riot once I think and got smashed.
but I have never had a more thrilling game, simply because of the players being great people.

love you Riot
